item.description:
UPDATE 12/18/09: WE HAVE CHANGED THE LOCATION OF MEXICAN NIGHT DUE TO LOW RESPONSE. WE HOPE THAT THE NEW LOCATION IS MORE CONVENIENT FOR EVERYONE. Border Cafe IS A VERY SIMILIAR RESTAURANT TO MARGARITA'S.



Lets go out to Margarita's restaurant in Salem NH for Margaritas, dinner and conversation.

Take a pick from the Russelrita, Lime in the Coconut, Mango Tangorita or the Heavens to Margatroid....Margaritas restaurant makes the best Margaritas this side of the Mississippi.

Not thirsty, ok how about a Chimachanga, burrito, fajita or a Quesadilla?

Grab your sombrero and lets go out to Margaritas for a great night with friends.

We will be asking that you keep your RSVP up to date so that we can get a call ahead seating. Margaritas tends to get really crowded on the weekend nights and the minimum wait is usually 1 1/2 hours. The RSVP will close 24 hours in advance so if your plans change between the closing of the RSVP and the start of the event please contact one of the Organizers of the group.

Hope to see you at the watering hole for some fun.
item.how_to_find_us: In the waiting area or ask for the meetup table
item.name: Mexican Night at Border Cafe in Saugus
